tool_description: Find email addresses associated with journalists and media outlets based on their domain address
name: Media Email Database
title: Media Email Database

api_list.name: Get Email Address By Domain
api_list.description: Fetch email addresses associated with a domain address
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://media-email-database.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "media-email-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://media-email-database.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "media-email-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
